TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemotingFormatter implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter

Docs.summary: Provides the remote procedure call (RPC) interface for all formatters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter> interface allows the implementing formatter to send and receive remote procedure calls (RPCs). For more information, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>. This interface is derived from <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Deserialize(class System.IO.Stream serializationStream, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.HeaderHandler handler) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize (serializationStream As Stream, handler As HeaderHandler) As Object

Docs.param: The from which the data is deserialized.
The delegate designed to handle objects. Can be .
Docs.summary: Begins the deserialization process of a remote procedure call (RPC).
Docs.returns: The root of the deserialized object graph.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header> objects contain information about a remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature).
> [!NOTE] > See the SOAP specification for more information on headers.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Serialize (System.IO.Stream serializationStream, object graph, System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header[] headers);

Docs.summary: Starts the serialization process of a remote procedure call (RPC).

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header> objects contain information about a remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature).
